title: M2 MacBook Pro: Why Does This Exist?
description: M2 MacBook Pro is the MOST confusing existence...unless you're an enterprise custom who simply doesn't care  Bar chart with Apple silicon performance:   MKBHD Merch:   Playlist of MKBHD Intro music:   ~
